author: jih2nn
content: I wrote an article on the complexity of FOCIL for the EL. It introduces three new or modified engine APIs and provides example implementations. It also covers the compatibility between FOCIL and BALs. Please have a look when you have some time: https://hackmd.io/@jihoonsong/BJpcaudvex

author: timbeiko
content:
Full ACDE recap coming later, but here are the important action items:

1. EIP-7928 (BALs) has been CFI'ed alongside other candidate headliners (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/10083)
2. We'll make a final call on CL headliners on next week's ACDC. CL teams, please share your latest thoughts, esp. w.r.t. EPBS. Assuming we go forward with it, we'll also make BALs a headliner. 
3. On next Monday's testing call, we'll review the issue raised about the transaction gas limit. Duncan from 0x will try and share more data about the impact on 0x by tomorrow. 
4. On the next ACDC, we'll finalize the "happy case" timeline for Fusaka deployments. Again, it would be great if teams could share their preferences ahead of the call based on today's discussion.
